ops.description: showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // “Yes, what will you have?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “In this store, you pay first.
It'll be 70 Gil.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // “Hey! Cancel that last order!”{PAUSE}“Excuse me!
You can't come in here and
order things without any money.
Come again…when you have money.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “Thank you.
Just a second.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // “Thank you.
Here's an item coupon
for the Pharmacy.”{PAUSE}“You can exchange it

for now.
Watch for our NEXT promotion!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // “Umf…grunt…smack…
Don't sneak up on me like that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // “I'm gonna get another
Pharmacy Coupon today.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // “I always get the Special.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // “It's thanks to the Don
that we can eat like this.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:19}); // “I'm gonna get another
Pharmacy Coupon today.”

dialogStrings:
“In this store, you pay first.
It'll be 70 Gil.”

“Hey! Cancel that last order!”{PAUSE}“Excuse me!
You can't come in here and
order things without any money.
Come again…when you have money.”

“Thank you.
Here's an item coupon
for the Pharmacy.”{PAUSE}“You can exchange it
for one item there.”{PAUSE}“That's our last coupon
for now.
Watch for our NEXT promotion!”

“Have a seat over here.”
{CHOICE}Sit down
{CHOICE}Don't sit down

{Cloud}
{CHOICE}No comment
{CHOICE}It was all right
{CHOICE}I've had better dog food

“Umf…grunt…smack…
Don't sneak up on me like that!”

“I'm gonna get another
Pharmacy Coupon today.”

“It's thanks to the Don
that we can eat like this.”

“Sorry!
But we're completely full!
Please come again!”
